messages.content: What is the role of HTTP in the modern application stack?
HTTP was established as a universal transport foundation for modern applications.
What is the role of HTTP in the transport layer of the stack?
HTTP/2 and HTTP/3 represent a de facto transport layer of the stack, arguably more complex and influential than the layers below it.
What is the main problem with using existing L7 protocols for agent communication?
Forcing all of the complexity of agent communication into the application payload, leading to a
What is the goal of the proposed new layers for the IoA stack?
To formalize the primitives of agent communication to prevent the ad-hoc chaos of proprietary, brittle, and non-interoperable agent protocols from solidifying.
What is the result of relying on existing L7 protocols for agent communication?
it will lead to a 'swamp' of proprietary, brittle, and non-interoperable agent protocols
